codes.APDS: Addition discount based on third-party agreed business promotional activity, i.e., extra 10 percent discount for 15 days)
codes.CHAR: Amount is new charges, for example new charges on a credit card.
codes.CITY: Tax accessed by city jurisdictions within a country.
codes.CNTY: Tax accessed by county jurisdictions within a country.
codes.INTC: Amount is interest charges, or example interest charges on a credit card.
codes.LOCL: Tax accessed by local jurisdictions within a country.
codes.PROV: Tax accessed by province jurisdictions within a country.
codes.STAT: Tax accessed by state jurisdictions within a country.
codes.TMDS: Discount based on terms negotiated for payment within a specified time period, i.e., 2/10 Net 30 (2 percent discount if paid in 10 days; otherwise, net amount is due in 30 days).

description: Specifies the nature, or use, of the amount, as published in an external document amount type code set.
name: ExternalDocumentAmountType1Code
